snippet.title: 【Hololive Fangame】WOWOWOW KORONE BOX - Now available!
snippet.description:
Download the game here: https://tiannya.itch.io/wowowow-korone-box

"WOWOWOW KORONE BOX" is a hololive fangame featuring Inugami Korone, member of hololive GAMERS. The game is a top-down shooter with the objective of collecting as many Korone Boxes as possible without getting hit even once. Korone must contend with many enemies and boss battles, but is given a variety of weapons to help her survive.

"WOWOWOW KORONE BOX" is inspired by Vlambeer's "Super Crate Box" and "Nuclear Throne".

Inugami Korone: @Korone Ch. 戌神ころね 

CREDITS
Design/Art/Programming: tian nya
Title Illustration: Kukie_nyan
Sound: tian nya, lots of free sounds and stream clips
Translation: Harutimu
Music Arrangements: tian nya
 • "ころねの最凶天災☆わんだふぉー❤わーるど" (Original: Inugami Korone & おぐらあすか) (https://youtu.be/nks1I1sY53I)
 • "ころねレイザー 戌More!" (Original: Koshiro Yuzo) (https://youtu.be/jGkOdq3qZbc)
 • "Koro Funk!" (Original: Omiyaクラブ) (https://youtu.be/lKEqU2itOiw)
 • "KORO DISCO!" (Original: Omiyaクラブ) (https://youtu.be/mRTap9LP1jo)
 • "Wan-Wan House!" (Original: Omiyaクラブ) (https://youtu.be/w1hlEyvXqXw)
Playtesting:
 • Chroneco
 • daiishori
 • Dokuro Deluxe
 • Harutimu
 • Hyde
 • Klaius
 • Kukie_nyan
 • lyrinne
 • Misa
 • nii
 • oimo buster
 • Shiinarei
 • Trap
 • Tsukino
 • Tuna

DISCLAIMER
This non-commercial game is a derivative work of Cover Corporation's hololive property. This game is not endorsed by or directly affiliated with Cover Corporation or hololive. The game is produced according to Cover Corporation's Derivative Work License Agreement. The developer does not claim any ownership of the hololive property.
